sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' class PartnerSignUp extends Component { state = { id: "", password: "", email: "", name: "", address: " ", description: "", about: "", sustainablePractices: "", foodReviews:[], sustainabilityReviews:[], averageFoodRating: 0, location: { lat: 0, lng: 0, }, website: "", phone: "", averageSustainabilityRating: 0, typeOfRewards: [], photos: "", } handleChange = () => { this.setState({ id: this.refs.idIN.value, password: this.refs.passwordIN.value, email: this.refs.emailIN.value, name: this.refs.nameIN.value, address: this.refs.addressIN.value, description: this.refs.descriptionIN.value, about: this.refs.aboutIN.value, sustainablePractices: this.refs.sustainablePracticeIN.value, location: { lat: this.refs.latIN.value, lng: this.refs.lngIN.value, }, website: this.refs.websiteIN.value, phone: this.refs.phoneIN.value, photos: this.refs.photoIN.value, }) } render() { return (
